-- Megatron --

Megatron's right eye is now functioning at 94% of normal, and he 
spots Hot Rod's attack. The quick kick, however, still manages to 
graze off of his side as he dodges to the right. 

Off balance, Megatron hits the ground, and slides. "Grrr, ENOUGH."

Megatron jumps to his feet, aims his weapons at Hot Rod, "Die." He 
fires two plasma blasts, and two rockets.

Quickly, he opens a commlink to all Predacons, "Predacons, retreat 
for the moment, our mission has been accomplished."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Kup::
> 
> "Got it boss," he yells to Talos.
> 
> Kup transformes and heads towards the base, just as a venom blast 
struck behind him.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> As the blades were directed too Hot Rod's left, Rod was about to 
go for a martial arts kick when Meg's jumped back.
> 
> Megatron fired and Hot Rod bloacked them with his mufflers on his 
arms. The parts were damaged but nothing that would injure Rod.
> 
> Then Hot Rod leaped into the air, sending a kick right at 
Megatrons chest.
